message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value. While I can't disclose specifics at this stage, I assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me. I'm confident that it could be even more valuable to you, depending on your needs and vision.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a significant discount from what I believe it's truly worth. If you're interested, let's discuss further. If not, I have another buyer lined up for $1000000.
